name: desert_of_reflection
prompt: In the middle of a vast desert, mirrors bloom like flowers. Travelers who look into them vanish. Write a short myth explaining why.
decoded: In the heart of the desert, a tribe of spirits created mirrors in the sand to guide travelers to their sacred land. However, those who gaze into the mirrors are taken by the spirits, leading them to a place of eternal rest. This is why travelers who look into the mirrors vanish, never to return.
